page.title: 15HOLIDAY MAKERS IN EXMOUTH
page.content: We interviewed 25 holiday makers on the beach at Sandy Bay, on June 18th, 1985. 96% did not live in Exmouth.They came from places as far away as Bristol,Middlesborough,Preston, Coventry,Manchester and Birmingham. Exmouth suits family holidays.Most families who visit Exmouth have 2 or 3 children.Only 8% were couples,the rest were families.All the people that we spoke to,were in Exmouth for 1 week. 12% were staying in hotels;4% were in tents;28% in chalets;48% in caravans and 8% were touring.The families said that they like Exmouth.THe beach is good for children. Many said that they like the West Country.4% came because of the holiday brochure.36% have more than 1 holiday a year.4% have a holiday abroad as well.100% said that they would holiday in Exmouth again.
